body:
My general Ping (connection time to the server) is around 110ms, which is quite good. But sometimes it isn't fast enough. Are there any ways that I can get this to come down further?

iBiZa
body_tagged:
My general Ping (connection time to the server) is around 110ms, which is quite good. But sometimes it isn't fast enough. Are there any ways that I can get this to come down further?

iBiZa
title: How to Improve Your Ping

replies.body: Move to USA or get a better internet provider, but I'm not sure if that even helps with ping...
replies.body_tagged: Move to USA or get a better internet provider, but I'm not sure if that even helps with ping...

replies.body:
If you use a router use the QoS system to make your computer with Internet priority.
Move to Canada
Get a better Internet Provider
replies.body_tagged:
If you use a router use the QoS system to make your computer with Internet priority.
Move to Canada
Get a better Internet Provider

replies.body:
You should be happy with 110ms.
And afaik, there's no way to improve your ping rather than moving closer to the host or getting better internet (Not too sure about the second one)
replies.body_tagged:
You should be happy with 110ms.
And afaik, there's no way to improve your ping rather than moving closer to the host or getting better internet (Not too sure about the second one)

replies.body:
110? I get that from the UK and I#m well chuffed with it haha :D
ye, they've all really said it:

Move closer to the host, which is in Canada ;)

replies.body:
Get a better connection to the server.
If you are on wireless go on wired
replies.body_tagged:
Get a better connection to the server.

replies.body:
I live in the USA but I do get a 120+ ms ping most of the time.  
I think maybe you should switch to a better internet provider and I should as well.
